mapper.insert: insert into bh_banner(title, content, writer, origin_file_name, upload_file_name, post_yn, created_at) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{originFileName}, #{uploadFileName}, #{postYn}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT ID ,UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, CONTENT FROM BH_BANNER WHERE POST_YN = 'Y';
mapper.update: UPDATE bh_banner SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, origin_file_name = #{originFileName}, upload_file_name = #{uploadFileName}, post_yn = #{postYn}, created_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
